notice.title: Project will be remade
notice.text: This project will be remade. The date has yet to be confirmed.

notice.title: Welcome
notice.text:
Thanks for playing DawnLine.
This game is based on the original game
Dancing Line.
Now there are 3 levels.

Website: https://dawnline.bluesdawn.top/

notice.title: 项目重制决定
notice.text: 该项目将会进行重制，时间待定

notice.title: 欢迎
notice.text:
感谢游玩DawnLine，本游戏是以《跳舞的线》为蓝本制作的饭制游戏
目前拥有3个关卡

官网：https://dawnline.bluesdawn.top/

notice.title: 項目重製決定
notice.text: 該項目將會進行重製，時間待定

notice.title: 歡迎
notice.text:
感謝遊玩DawnLine，本遊戲是以「跳舞的線」為藍本製作的飯制遊戲
目前已有3個關卡

官網：https://dawnline.bluesdawn.top/
